plot: Doug finds his new camera phone tempts him to do things he hasn't done before. Playful fun with phone photos and video takes Doug on a journey of transformation.
title: The Camera Phone
plot_es: Doug finds his new camera phone tempts him to do things he hasn't done before. Playful fun with phone photos and video takes Doug on a journey of transformation.
plot_en: Doug finds his new camera phone tempts him to do things he hasn't done before. Playful fun with phone photos and video takes Doug on a journey of transformation.
